mapper.select: select s.* from snapshots s, projects p where p.kee=#{id} and p.enabled=${_true} and p.copy_resource_id is null and s.islast=${_true} and p.id=s.project_id
select s.* from snapshots s where s.project_id=#{id} and s.islast=${_true}
select * from projects where scope='PRJ' and root_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into projects (name, long_name, description, scope, qualifier, kee, language, root_id, copy_resource_id, person_id, enabled, created_at) values ( #{name}, #{longName}, #{description}, #{scope}, #{qualifier}, #{key}, #{language}, #{rootId}, #{copyResourceId}, #{personId}, #{enabled}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.update: update projects set name=#{name}, long_name=#{longName}, description=#{description}, scope=#{scope}, qualifier=#{qualifier}, kee=#{key}, language=#{language}, root_id=#{rootId}, copy_resource_id=#{copyResourceId}, person_id=#{personId}, enabled=#{enabled} where id=#{id}
